data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of the kalshoveni species-group of the genus Nemophora Hoffmannsegg (Lepidoptera, Adelidae), with descriptions of six new species from Indonesia and Papua New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kozlov, Mikhail V. (2016): A taxonomic revision of the kalshoveni species-group of the genus Nemophora Hoffmannsegg (Lepidoptera, Adelidae), with descriptions of six new species from Indonesia and Papua New Guinea. Zootaxa 4189 (3): 559-570, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.3.6
